constraint.display: Value must be an integer multiple of 8 and between 8 and 0xFFFFFFFF
Value must be 0 or an integer multiple of 8 between 8 and 0xFFFFFFFF

property.display: Heap size (bytes) - A minimum of 4K (0x1000) is required if standard library functions are to be used.

constraint.display: Value must be 0 or an integer multiple of 8 between 8 and 0xFFFFFFFF. A minimum of 4K (0x1000) is required if standard library functions are to be used.

option.display: IWDT is automatically activated after a reset (Autostart mode)
NMI request or interrupt request is enabled
Stop counting when in Sleep, Snooze mode, Software Standby, or Deep Software Standby mode
Automatically activate WDT after a reset (auto-start mode)
Stop WDT after a reset (register-start mode)
Stop counting when entering Sleep mode
Voltage monitor 0 reset is enabled after reset
Voltage monitor 0 reset is disabled after reset
HOCO oscillation is enabled after reset
HOCO oscillation is disabled after reset

constraint.display: Value must be an integer between 0 and 0xFFFFFFFF
Value must be an integer between 0 and 0xFFFFFFFF
Value must be an integer between 0 and 0xFFFFFFFF
Value must be an integer between 0 and 0xFFFFFFFF

config.content: #define BSP_BOARD_S124_DK #define BSP_CFG_MCU_PART_PACKAGE (${config.mcu.s124_dk.package}) #define BSP_CFG_MCU_PART_MEMORY_SIZE (${config.mcu.s124_dk.memory}) #define BSP_CFG_MCU_PART_CORE (${config.mcu.s124_dk.core}) #define BSP_CFG_MCU_PART_SERIES (${config.mcu.s124_dk.series}) #define BSP_CFG_STACK_MAIN_BYTES (${config.board_common.main}) #define BSP_CFG_STACK_PROCESS_BYTES (${config.board_common.process}) #define BSP_CFG_HEAP_BYTES (${config.board_common.heap}) #define OFS_SEQ1 0xA001A001 | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_start_mode}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_timeout}) #define OFS_SEQ2 (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_divisor}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_window_end}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_window_start}) #define OFS_SEQ3 (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_reset_interrupt}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.iwdt_stop_control}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_start_mode}) #define OFS_SEQ4 (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_timeout}) |(${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_divisor}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_window_end}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_window_start}) #define OFS_SEQ5 (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_reset_interrupt}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS0.wdt_stop_control}) #define BSP_CFG_ROM_REG_OFS0 (OFS_SEQ1 | OFS_SEQ2 | OFS_SEQ3 | OFS_SEQ4 | OFS_SEQ5) #define BSP_CFG_ROM_REG_OFS1 (0xFFFFFEC3 | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS1.voltage_detection0.start}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS1.voltage_detection0_level}) | (${config.mcu.s124.OFS1.hoco_osc})) #define BSP_CFG_ID_CODE_LONG_1 (${config.board.s124_dk.id1}) #define BSP_CFG_ID_CODE_LONG_2 (${config.board.s124_dk.id2}) #define BSP_CFG_ID_CODE_LONG_3 (${config.board.s124_dk.id3}) #define BSP_CFG_ID_CODE_LONG_4 (${config.board.s124_dk.id4}) #define BSP_CFG_MCU_VCC_MV (${config.board.common.vcc}) #define BSP_CFG_PARAM_CHECKING_ENABLE (${config.board.common.checking}) #define BSP_CFG_RTOS (${config.board.common.rtos}) #define BSP_CFG_ASSERT (${config.board.common.assert}) #define BSP_CFG_ERROR_LOG (${config.board.common.error_log})

option.display: Priority 3 (lowest, not valid if using ThreadX)

node.tooltip: Click to edit the XTAL frequency.
The system clock (ICLK) is used as the operating clock of the CPU, DMAC, DTC, ROM and RAM.
The Peripheral clock B (PCLKB) is used as the operating clock for all other modules not supported by PCLKA, PCLKC and PCLKD.
The Peripheral clock D (PCLKD) is used as the operating clock for the GPT module.
The USB clock (UCLK) is an operating clock for the USBFS module.\nA 48-MHz clock must be supplied to the USB module.\nWhen the USB module is used, setting must be made so that UCLK is 48 MHz.
